discussion_comments.comment_body: If `common` is included in the app layout, do we really need to call it from every other entrypoint?
This is not normal. It means that the configuration applied to TS files has changed. It is intended that default exports are forbidden in TS files

Maybe it's a change in the rule, since this is what I get (even tried changing from warn to error)
```
/home/nschonni/mastodon/app/javascript/mastodon/api.ts
  47:1  error  Unused eslint-disable directive (no problems were reported from 'import/no-default-export')
```
